name: Student
text: So we found all of the segment needed to craft a key huh? Mr. Joseph

name: Joseph
text: It was a long journey we got here hmm.

name: Joseph
text: I have to thank you for help kid, you are the brave one.

name: Joseph
text: Let's have a break here for a moment, I need to prepare some medicine before get inside.

name: Joseph
text: You know, just to make sure.
